    "file_path": "h2q_project/evolution_system.py",
    "content": "import traceback

class EvolutionSystem:
    def __init__(self, code_generator, code_validator, code_integrator, logger):
        self.code_generator = code_generator
        self.code_validator = code_validator
        self.code_integrator = code_integrator
        self.logger = logger

    def evolve(self, initial_state):
        state = initial_state
        try:
            # Code Generation
            generated_code = self.code_generator.generate(state)
            self.logger.log("Generated code:\n" + generated_code)

            # Code Validation
            validation_result = self.code_validator.validate(generated_code)
            if not validation_result:
                error_message = f"Code validation failed: {self.code_validator.get_errors()}"
                self.logger.log(error_message)
                raise Exception(error_message)  # Raise exception to trigger rollback
            self.logger.log("Code validation successful.")

            # Code Integration
            new_state = self.code_integrator.integrate(state, generated_code)
            self.logger.log("Code integration successful.")
            return new_state

        except Exception as e:
            # Error Handling and Rollback
            error_message = f"Evolution failed: {e}\n{traceback.format_exc()}"
            self.logger.log(error_message)
            # Attempt rollback to the initial state (or a known good state)
            self.logger.log("Attempting rollback...")
            try:
                state = initial_state # Reset to the initial state
                self.logger.log("Rollback successful.")
            except Exception as rollback_e:
                self.logger.log(f"Rollback failed: {rollback_e}\n{traceback.format_exc()}")
            return state # Return the rolled-back state or the initial state
"
  }
